summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York inquiring about the most recent date Jeffrey Epstein registered and affirmed his residence at 9 East 71st Street in New York City under SORNA (Sex Offender Registration and Notification Act) requirements.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the SORNA registration inquiry, specifically regarding confirmation of his residence at 9 East 71st Street.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, seeking clarification on Epstein's sex offender registration dates and residence affirmation.

connections.description: The prosecutor is investigating Epstein's compliance with sex offender registration requirements regarding his residence.

events.title: Inquiry into Epstein's SORNA registration
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails to determine the most recent date Jeffrey Epstein registered and affirmed his residence at 9 East 71st Street under SORNA.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a 2019 email from a federal prosecutor inquiring about Jeffrey Epstein's sex offender registration compliance.
It specifically seeks the most recent date Epstein confirmed his residence at 9 East 71st Street in New York City.
The inquiry relates to the Sex Offender Registration and Notification Act (SORNA) requirements.
It indicates ongoing legal scrutiny of Epstein's registration status shortly before his 2019 arrest.
